name: Chat Chain
description: Chat Chain is the first Blockchain's on-chain instant messaging app fully focused on safety and security of its users plus featuring various business and marketing tools for project owners and marketers. With Chat Chain app you can send and receive messages on-chain using your wallet address on your favorite blockchain. Messages can be normal or encrypted which can only be encrypted by your wallet on Chat Chain app. No one else can read your encrypted messages except you! Highlights: - 100% On-Chain - Safe & Secure - Multi Chain - Encrypted & Anonymous
